name: rootForce (Liech)
description:
Reverse Horror Game. A genetical modified root escapes the evil Lumberjack Laboratory by growing and growing and growing.

Controls:

You do not have direct control. The Root will tend to grow in the direction of your cursor. You can enhance the growing by clicking left.

You can use Skills by pressing "1" or "2" and move the mouse near your root. Then click left again to either attack or force a new growing branch.

GGJ:

Developed at the GGJ23. The Theme was 'Roots'

https://www.igjam.eu/jams/ggj-2023/902/

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/root-force-7
